title: “Tree of life”: How baobab seeds-derived biochar could lead to water safety for underprivileged communities through heavy metal (Fe) removal – SDG 6

Abstract: The abnormally gigantic baobab tree (Adansonia digitata) is often referred to as the “Tree of Life” due to its ability to provide food, water, shelter, and traditional medicine for...
